I usually set a general goal, mission to mimnus, misson to mun, ect. then go from there. my mission to mun resulted in me having to send a rescue mission for 2 kerbals left behind(bill and bob since jeb didn't want to stay behind), which resulted in me needing a rescue mission for the rescue mission since i accidently quicksaved too late and started the final brakeing too late. now i'm working on a space station.
